title: City of Riches
description: Discover City of Riches -CityofAR! Dive into 10 epic missions with innovative gameplay, stunning visuals, and dynamic animations. Compete on the global leaderboard and experience thrilling single-player action. Join now and make your mark!
longDescription:

![City of Riches-c775c](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6adbe50d7a21403a8a81d4695a0dad12/city-of-riches-c775c.png)

<!--image-->
![City of Riches-10nnv](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6adbe50d7a21403a8a81d4695a0dad12/city-of-riches-10nnv.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Embark on an Epic Adventure in the City of Riches!
<!--text-->
immersive journey into a forgotten metropolis where a legendary treasure awaits your discovery.

**Embark on an Epic Adventure:**
Explore 10 unique stages, each revealing a different part of the city's story. Navigate through complex structures, dodge enemy turrets, bots, and landmines, and collect treasures to advance through each level.

**Features:**
DYNAMIC ENVIRONMENT: Immerse yourself in a living, breathing world where you can use the nature gun to plant different types of trees. These trees will grow and produce blood boxes that you can pick up to stay alive, creating a stunning visual nature to enjoy, complete with sunshine and sunrises.

**ADVANCED MOVEMENT MECHANICS:**
 Take advantage of vaulting, ladder climbing, aim offset for precise targeting, and new animations by Cores Studio that add a fresh and immersive layer to your gameplay.

**WEATHER EFFECTS:** 
Experience realistic weather changes, including rain and snow, which impact the environment and gameplay.

**STUNNING VISUALS AND SOUND:** Enjoy high-definition visuals, captivating soundscapes, and a beautiful UI widget that enhances your gaming experience.

**NATURAL SOUNDS:** Immerse yourself in the ambiance with nature sounds like storms, crickets, grasshoppers, and birds, enhancing the realism of the game world.

**DAY-NIGHT CYCLE:** Witness the seamless transition from day to night, affecting visibility and gameplay strategies.

**STRONG FIRING SYSTEMS:** 
Experience thrilling combat with strong firing system animations.

**Game Weapons Overview:**
Players have access to a diverse arsenal of weapons, including:
M4A1
Krinkov AK74-U
AK47
Special Gun: Powerful Gun (BMG-50CAL)
Nature Gun: Plant trees
Bazooka Rocket: Primarily used by enemies, adding an extra layer of challenge to the game.

**FINAL STAGE EXPLORATION:**
 In the final stage, the entire city opens up for exploration, revealing its secrets. Unlock doors, collect items, and battle enemies to find the ultimate treasure.

**IN-GAME GUIDE: **
Access the in-game guide to learn how to play and master the game.

**VEHICLES:**
 Drive the M4BMW car or pilot the SpaceJet for added excitement.

**MULTILINGUAL SUPPORT:** 
This product comes with translations in twelve languages, each represented by their flag.

**Gameplay Highlights:**
EXPLORE THE FORGOTTEN CITY: Navigate through 10 stages, each with its own unique design and challenges, revealing different parts of the city's story.

**OVERCOME OBSTACLES:**
 Dodge enemy turrets, bots, and landmines while collecting treasures to advance.

**UNLOCK THE CITY'S SECRETS:**
 In the final stage, explore the entire city, use keys to unlock doors, collect items, and battle enemies to find the ultimate treasure.

**IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE: **
With stunning new animations by Cores Studio, high-quality resolutions, captivating videos, and fresh sound instruments, every moment is filled with excitement and discovery.

****Strategic Elements:**
PLANT TREES FOR RESOURCES:** 
Use the nature gun to plant five different types of trees. These trees will grow and produce blood boxes, which you can collect to stay alive, creating a stunning natural environment for you to enjoy, complete with beautiful sunshine and mesmerizing sunrises.

Are you ready to uncover the secrets of the forgotten city and claim the legendary treasure? Download 'City of Riches' now and embark on your epic journey! Compete with players worldwide and climb the leaderboards to prove your skills and achieve the highest scores.
